EmailTemplate.name: Dubai GL Store Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Rimowa Dubai stores network update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
Your RIMOWA store in Dubai Mall Galerie Lafayette is now permanently closed. We will continue to operate from our main store in the Dubai Mall and I will be delighted to welcome and serve you with the same dedication from this other location. Find below the store address: Rimowa The Dubai Mall Fashion Avenue – Ground Floor – Unit GF038 Tel: 045847391
Would you be interested in visiting us at the store? **It would be great opportunity for me to show you some new products that I think would greatly interest you. **
I thank you for being part of our history in our Dubai Mall Galerie Lafayette store and look forward to assisting you,
Regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
